title: [Massive] Optimized Speech and Phonological Learning Program for Bilinguals

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental phonetics concepts and elementary proficiency in at least one foreign language
context.additional_context: Application-centered education for professionals, leveraging smartphone-based learning environments and workplace integration.

learning_goals: Learners can reproduce the phonological system of a target accent (Sussex dialect) with 80% accuracy through imitation experiments
Learners improve their ability to apply new phonological rules using their native language pronunciation system in spontaneous reproduction tasks
Learners improve pronunciation accuracy of work-related mathematical terminology by 60% within three months through speech recognition enhancement strategies

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
